Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Have you all arrived safely?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Well, you're in one piece, so that counts.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...So where's our destination this time?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "It's top secret, so I'll let the President explain himself.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Some military facilities were abandoned in the early Post-Pandemic Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'There are some items that we were not able to retrieve in time. Commander Nikola would like you to recover them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Meanwhile, I would like the target facilities to be repaired and reactivated.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'By the way, for this operation, we have assistants standing by to help you all identify the server centers where the data is stored.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A small figure appears from the shadows of the building.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: '...The mechanoids wandering around in the area are technically related to the performance troupe...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'So this operation concerns the Nighter as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "If the mechanoids prowling around here aren't Corrupted, then they have a place on the Nighter.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'What are you doing here?', 3: '30', 4: 'You really are something', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What? No thanks for the one who saved your life?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I heard all about it. I must express my greatest gratitude on Babylonia's behalf.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "...When I show you to the database, Mr. President, I hope you'll remember what you promised me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Of course. 【kuroname】 will make the arrangements.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Huh? So 【kuroname】 is in charge? Well, I guess I'll trust you for now.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I gotta warn you... though what you'll see in the database belongs to Babylonia, you can also find secrets of the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce. So watch what you're watching!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As Pulao gets more and more animated, her little fists dancing in the air, Hassen wisely speaks up to cut her off.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'To conclude, please work together and perform your duties to the best of your ability.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Because of the sensitive nature of this operation, as well as the complicated status of the Corrupted, I've arranged for Bianca to provide overwatch.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I've got you covered.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Of course, we\'ll discuss details of providing "materiel" to the Nighter once the operation is finished.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "But let's focus on the mission first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'You Babylonians gotta work on brevity in your briefings...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Anyway, let's get ready to crack some skulls.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'The mechs have already surrounded us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Too bad they're already seriously affected by the Punishing Virus.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Already? When did—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You didn't know? My ears are pretty sharp.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Pulao's nonchalant air makes you think she's hiding how she really feels."}
